repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian
ENV GITHUB_API_TOKEN xxxx
LABEL maintainer="fazzani.heni@outlook.com" \
      description="debian image with pr√©installed xmltv_util package" \
      system.dist="linux" \
	  multi.name="xmltv_util"

WORKDIR /work

RUN apt-get -qq update \
    && apt-get -y upgrade \
    && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install xmltv-util dos2unix zip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

CMD [ "/bin/bash" ]
